thread.title: Global Outsourcing Platform Sekai Lab Inc. Has Been Established in California
thread.title_full: Global Outsourcing Platform Sekai Lab Inc. Has Been Established in California

author: admin
title: Global Outsourcing Platform Sekai Lab Inc. Has Been Established in California
text:
Sekai Lab Pte. Ltd. 
TOKYO -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Monstar Lab, Inc. (Meguro-ku in Tokyo, Headquarters: Singapore, CEO: Hiroki Inagawa, hereinafter referred to as Monstar Lab), that holds a subsidiary Sekai Lab Pte. Ltd. operating global sourcing platform made in Japan, has launched Sekai Lab Inc., US sales and marketing offices, headquartered in San Francisco. 
Sekai Lab Business Overview Sekai Lab has a philosophy of "providing every company with development resources". Sekai Lab, “Sekai” meaning the world in Japanese, has served as a platform that connects clients and software development teams all over the world mainly in Asia in order to fulfill the shortage of software developers as the demand for them continues to grow. Currently Sekai Lab platform holds more than 100 companies, 300 teams, and 10,000 developers from 15 countries registered as partners. With that, it is able to provide development teams consisting of project managers, designers, and developers in a flexible way that matches client's requirements. 
We provide resources of development office Sekai Lab started its service in 2014, and now holds in-house development centers in China (Chengdu in Sichuan and Qindao in Shandong), Vietnam (Da Nang) and Bangladesh (Dhaka) managing 100 partner companies scattering in 15 Asian countries.Sekai Lab platform that was serving mainly to Japanese market, has started business in Singapore and Shanghai earlier this year. In order to broaden even further, Sekai Lab has come to establish US headquarters in California, the world's largest and the most advanced district in tech industry, for the following four reasons. Human resources of software development in the U.S., especially in Silicon Valley and Los Angeles are scarce. Therefore the market demand for reasonable and skilled engineer resources in Asia is prospected. There was a need for setting up US headquarters to offer services supporting Japanese and Chinese companies entering and expanding in North America. A need to provide localization services to support North American companies enter and expand in Asian markets (especially China). By feeling the evolution of technology in Silicon Valley, Sekai Lab intends to make US offices function as a marketing and research base in order to make our services more global and cutting edge. 
In addition, prior to the establishment of US headquarters, Sekai Lab has made and launched the platform available in English. 
Strategy of US Headquarters Sekai Lab aims for $10 million (about 1 billion yen) annual sales by end of 2017. Starting mainly from Los Angeles and the Bay Area (San Francisco and Silicon Valley), Sekai Lab plans to expand towards other US locations such as New York, Boston, Texas, and Canada. 
General Information about Sekai Lab Inc. CEO : Hiroki InagawaSVP/US Operation Lead : Will TachiiriFounded on September 14th, 2015 
San Francisco Office (HQ)580 California Street, Suite 1200San Francisco, CA 94104
